items.name: avalanche
items.description: Avalanche is an End-to-End Continual Learning Library based on PyTorch, for fast prototyping, training, and reproducible evaluation of continual learning algorithms.

items.name: Renate
items.description: Renate is a Python package for automatic retraining of neural networks models. It uses advanced Continual Learning and Lifelong Learning algorithms to achieve this purpose.
